name: Beat Battle Duel
description:
Join us in the latest free music rhythm game: Beat Battle Duel.

Follow the rhythm! Tap to the beats and master your favorite songs.

Beat Battle Duel brings you an excellent gameplay experience with stunning graphics where you show the best fingertips skills to beat your famous and favorite characters in the battles.

Let’s make a fight to earn your fame and make more new girlfriends now!

TAP YOUR BEAT

1. Follow the rhythm!
2. Feel every beat pulse through your finger!
3. Fight till the last seconds in the battles!
4. Earn your respect and conquer the heart of your girlfriend!

HOW TO PLAY
- Tap the note as it reaches the pressing area.
- Tap and hold for the long notes.

GAME FEATURES
1. Various songs: Pop, Hip-hop, EDM, FNF and more genre of music are waiting for you. Play anytime you want.
2. Different difficulties bring more choice, try your skill with all difficulties.
3. Continuously update various songs.
4. Use high-quality music sources and musical scores. Make you the best rhythm game experience.
5. The global ranking is updated every day. Try to become a top player.
